hero.headline: Elevate Your Look, Calm Your Mind.
hero.subtext: Expert color, precision cuts, and a glass of wine. Discover why Carol has been Doylestown's trusted stylist for nearly three decades.

image.alt: Modern salon interior with vintage gold accents

trustbar.headline: Trusted in Doylestown for Nearly Three Decades

about.story_text: Carol doesn't just cut hair; she knows her clients. With 27 years of experience, we focus on the art of personalized transformation and the science of healthy hair.
about.founder_note: Your hair is the crown you never take off.

service_area.headline: Conveniently Located in Doylestown
service_area.subtext: Serving premium clients across the heart of Bucks and Montgomery Counties.

processSteps.title: The Consult
processSteps.description: A modern welcome and objective review to tailor the look to your vision.

processSteps.title: Immersive Relaxation
processSteps.description: Enjoy a smoothie or a glass of wine while we begin your treatment.

processSteps.title: The Transformation
processSteps.description: Expert wash, color, and precision cut using premium products.

processSteps.title: The Reveal
processSteps.description: Leave feeling refreshed, confident, and ready for the world.

features.title: Color Mastery
features.description: Specializing in balayage and corrective color techniques.

features.title: Relaxation First
features.description: A high-end, quiet environment designed for your comfort.

testimonials.quote: Carol is a genius with color. I've been coming here for 10 years and wouldn't go anywhere else.
testimonials.author: Sarah J.
